title: Hanes Mens 2 Pack Cotton Sleep Short, 7.5" Inseam, Comfortable and Breathable, Assorted Colors
description: Ultimate Comfort: Experience unmatched comfort with these Hanes sleep shorts, designed with a soft cotton blend and a flexible elastic waistband for a perfect fit all night long.
Breathable & Lightweight: Stay cool and relaxed in these lightweight pajama shorts, featuring a breathable fabric that's ideal for sleeping or lounging at home.
Convenient 2-Pack: Double the value and versatility with this pack of two, ensuring you always have a clean pair on hand for a restful night's sleep.
Classic Style & Fit: These sleep shorts boast a classic look with practical side pockets and adjustable drawstrings, making them a staple in any men's sleepwear collection.
Easy Care & Durable: These Hanes sleep shorts are machine washable and designed to retain softness and color, ensuring long-lasting comfort and convenience.
